lines.text:
[to Curly]
And what did you answer when they asked what does a navigator do?
I told them a navigator crawls through a swamp until it becomes a suitcase, and bites like this too.
[Gestures his hands with the snapping motion of an alligator's jaws, with growling imitation]
[Uses horizontal motion of alligator's jaws, then slaps Curly with both hands]
If this is what I think it is, you'll get your wings and a harp with 'em!

[eyeing Larry, who is dressed as a woman]
Come here, my little edelweiss. Zit on my lap.

[looking at the overweight general]
What lap?
